_source.content: The fear of the Lord is just the proper reaction of sinners to God‚Äôs infinite holiness, or of creatures to God‚Äôs infinite majesty. As we grow in the knowledge of God, we will learn truly to tremble before His great glory and burning purity, and see this as indeed the beginning of wisdom. --Eric J. Alexander-Feed My Sheep, ed. Don Kistler, Soli Deo Gloria Ministries, 2002, p. 232.
_source.contentraw:
The fear of the Lord is just the proper reaction of sinners to God‚Äôs infinite holiness, or of creatures to God‚Äôs infinite majesty. As we grow in the knowledge of God, we will learn truly to tremble before His great glory and burning purity, and see this as indeed the beginning of wisdom. --Eric J. Alexander

-Feed My Sheep, ed. Don Kistler, Soli Deo Gloria Ministries, 2002, p. 232.

group.description: "Here I stand."Martin Luther's immortal words. And here we stand - fleeing to Christ as our only hope for salvation."I was brutish and ignorant; I was like a beast toward you. Nevertheless, I am continually with you; you hold my right hand. You guide me with your counsel, and afterward you will receive me to glory. Whom have I in heaven but you? And there is nothing on earth that I desire besides you." (Psalm 73)Here we stand, on the "Five Solas" of the great reformation in Christian theology - the "Reformation."1. Sola Scriptura - The authoritative rule for religious knowledge, faith and practice is the Bible alone (and not the traditions of any church or other religious organization).2. Sola Gratia - We - all we descendents of Adam - are sinners by nature. In ourselves, we are dead and dying - and utterly helpless and hopeless to save ourselves. We are completely dependent on God's grace alone to save us.3. Sola Fide - By His great mercy, God is pleased to save those who have faith in the only begotten Son of God, Jesus Christ. The instrument of our salvation is faith alone (and not our efforts or work).4. Solus Christus - It is the work of Christ alone - His perfect life of completely fulfilling the Law of God, His atoning sacrifice of death on the Cross to pay for our sins, and His resurrection from the dead to conquer death - that is the only merit and basis for our salvation.5. Soli Deo Gloria - Our salvation is completely by and from God, and God alone receives the glory for our salvation."Now we know that whatever the law says it speaks to those who are under the law, so that every mouth may be stopped, and the whole world may be held accountable to God. For by works of the law no human being will be justified in his sight, since through the law comes knowledge of sin. But now the righteousness of God has been manifested apart from the law, although the Law and the Prophets bear witness to it - the righteousness of God through faith in Jesus Christ for all who believe. For there is no distinction. for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God, and are justified by his grace as a gift, through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus, whom God put forward as a propitiation by his blood, to be received by faith. This was to show God's righteousness, because in his divine forbearance he had passed over former sins. It was to show his righteousness at the present time, so that he might be just and the justifier of the one who has faith in Jesus." (Romans 3:19-26)The purpose of this group is to promote & elucidate reformed Christian theology, and in so doing, glorify God, encourage his people, and urge sinners to flee to Christ, our only eternal hope and comfort.
group.title: Reformed Christian Theology

_source.content: #Biden #EricCiaramella #MichaelCarpenter #UPennBidenCenterUH-OH: Biden Lackey and Manager of UPenn Biden Center Was Involved in Trump Impeachment Sham (Michael Carpenter)Gateway Pundit ^ | 1/21/23 | Joe HoftIn 2020, The Gateway Pundit reported that a 2015 photo of whistleblower Eric Ciaramella taking notes in a meeting with a Biden advisor and Ukrainian officials emerged.Investigative reporter Paul Sperry, who initially broke the story of the identity of the whistleblower, tweeted out the photo.‚ÄúEric Ciaramella, the CIA operative believed to be the ‚Äúwhistleblower,‚Äù is captured in this 2015 photo taking notes b/t Biden adviser Michael Carpenter & NSC‚Äôs Liz Zentos in WH meeting w Ukrainian officials. Carpenter later appeared w Biden in infamous ‚Äúson of a bitch‚Äù vid,‚Äù Sperry said in the caption.Who can forget Joe Biden bragging about getting the prosecutor kicked off the case investigating Biden‚Äôs son Hunter Biden? This was a man bragging about committing a crime. Sitting next to Biden was his lackey Michael Carpenter.According to Foreign Affairs, ‚ÄúCoauthors Joe Biden and Michael Carpenter discuss the article, ‚ÄúHow to Stand Up to the Kremlin: Defending Democracy Against Its Enemies,‚Äù which appears in the January/February issue of Foreign Affairs.‚ÄùIt turns out that the young lackey sitting next to Biden in the video above, Michael Carpenter, went on to be the Managing Director at the Penn U Biden Center. This is the same location where top secret classified documents were located recently laying around.Paul Sperry wrote on his Twitter account on January 12, ‚ÄúNEW: The managing partner of Penn Biden think tank in DC where Biden had highly classified documents stashed concerning Ukraine was none other than Biden‚Äôs Ukraine adviser Michael Carpenter, seen here sitting next to Schiff‚Äôs Ukraine impeachment whistleblower Eric Ciaramella.‚Äù
_source.contentraw:
#Biden #EricCiaramella #MichaelCarpenter #UPennBidenCenter
UH-OH: Biden Lackey and Manager of UPenn Biden Center Was Involved in Trump Impeachment Sham (Michael Carpenter)
Gateway Pundit ^ | 1/21/23 | Joe Hoft

In 2020, The Gateway Pundit reported that a 2015 photo of whistleblower Eric Ciaramella taking notes in a meeting with a Biden advisor and Ukrainian officials emerged.

Investigative reporter Paul Sperry, who initially broke the story of the identity of the whistleblower, tweeted out the photo.

‚ÄúEric Ciaramella, the CIA operative believed to be the ‚Äúwhistleblower,‚Äù is captured in this 2015 photo taking notes b/t Biden adviser Michael Carpenter & NSC‚Äôs Liz Zentos in WH meeting w Ukrainian officials. Carpenter later appeared w Biden in infamous ‚Äúson of a bitch‚Äù vid,‚Äù Sperry said in the caption.

Who can forget Joe Biden bragging about getting the prosecutor kicked off the case investigating Biden‚Äôs son Hunter Biden? This was a man bragging about committing a crime. Sitting next to Biden was his lackey Michael Carpenter.

According to Foreign Affairs, ‚ÄúCoauthors Joe Biden and Michael Carpenter discuss the article, ‚ÄúHow to Stand Up to the Kremlin: Defending Democracy Against Its Enemies,‚Äù which appears in the January/February issue of Foreign Affairs.‚Äù

It turns out that the young lackey sitting next to Biden in the video above, Michael Carpenter, went on to be the Managing Director at the Penn U Biden Center. This is the same location where top secret classified documents were located recently laying around.

Paul Sperry wrote on his Twitter account on January 12, ‚ÄúNEW: The managing partner of Penn Biden think tank in DC where Biden had highly classified documents stashed concerning Ukraine was none other than Biden‚Äôs Ukraine adviser Michael Carpenter, seen here sitting next to Schiff‚Äôs Ukraine impeachment whistleblower Eric Ciaramella.‚Äù

card.description: Three teenagers who beat Fox News weatherman Adam Klotz have been released without charges. The handling of the New York subway attack on Sunday morning has attracted criticism.
card.title: Anger as teens who battered Fox weatherman are let go without charges¬†

_source.content: Three teenagers who badly battered Fox News weatherman Adam Klotz on the New York City subway have been released without charges.  Social media users were up in arms today after discovering the suspects - who are aged between 15 and 17 - will not face a criminal investigation, with one asking how anyone can feel safe in the city. The handling of the case has added fuel to criticism of Manhattan's District Attorney Alvin Bragg, who is frequently accused of being too 'woke' and soft on crime since he took on the role in November 2021. Meanwhile others have taken aim at New York mayor Eric Adams who one user called 'an empty suit', adding that living in the city is 'not safe'. https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-11666643/Anger-Manhattan-DA-three-teens-battered-Fox-News-weatherman-let-without-charges.html
_source.contentraw:
Three teenagers who badly battered Fox News weatherman Adam Klotz on the New York City subway have been released without charges.

Social media users were up in arms today after discovering the suspects - who are aged between 15 and 17 - will not face a criminal investigation, with one asking how anyone can feel safe in the city.

The handling of the case has added fuel to criticism of Manhattan's District Attorney Alvin Bragg, who is frequently accused of being too 'woke' and soft on crime since he took on the role in November 2021.

Meanwhile others have taken aim at New York mayor Eric Adams who one user called 'an empty suit', adding that living in the city is 'not safe'.
https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-11666643/Anger-Manhattan-DA-three-teens-battered-Fox-News-weatherman-let-without-charges.html

card.description: Nita Farahany, recently speaking at the World Economic Forum‚Äôs (WEF) annual meeting in Davos, Switzerland, touted the ‚Äúextraordinary promise‚Äù of the use of mind-reading devices in the workplace and elsewhere. Farahany noted that the...
card.title: WEF speaker: Society 'should want' mind-reading devices

_source.content: #GlobalOligarchs #WEF #Davos #NitaFarahany #Privacy #MindReadingWEF speaker: Society 'should want' mind-reading devicesAmerican Thinker ^ | 23 Jan, 2023 | Eric Utterhttps://www.americanthinker.com/blog/2023/01/wef_speaker_society_should_want_mindreading_devices.htmlNita Farahany, recently speaking at the World Economic Forum‚Äôs (WEF) annual meeting in Davos, Switzerland, touted the ‚Äúextraordinary promise‚Äù of the use of mind-reading devices in the workplace and elsewhere. Farahany noted that the devices, in some forms, are already here. The legal ethicist and author of The Battle for Your Brain gave a talk titled ‚ÄúReady for Brain Transparency?‚Äù She cited existing consumer-wearable devices such as ‚Äúheadbands, hats that have sensors that can pick up your brain wave activity, earbuds, headphones, tiny tattoos that you can wear behind your ear -- we can pick up emotional states.‚Äù Kinda creepy if you ask me.During a WEF ‚ÄúTransforming Medicine, Redefining Life‚Äù panel discussion, Farahany said that this technology will soon be integrated into ‚Äúmulti-functional devices,‚Äù so that -- for example -- the same earbuds used to take conference calls and listen to music would be laced with EEG sensors to pick up brain waves. The ‚Äúlegal ethicist‚Äù stated that it would then be possible to ‚Äúpick up and decode faces that you‚Äôre seeing in your mind, simple shapes, numbers, your pin number.‚Äù What could go wrong?Farahany predicted that in the ‚Äúnear-term future,‚Äù such devices will become ‚Äúthe primary way with which we interact with all of the rest of our technology,‚Äù and pointed out that major tech companies like Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs Meta are already ‚Äúinvestigating ways to make these devices universally applicable.‚Äù She claimed this would allow a person to, for example, ‚Äúsimply swipe with your mind‚Äù instead of with a mouse or keyboard.
_source.contentraw:
#GlobalOligarchs #WEF #Davos #NitaFarahany #Privacy #MindReading
WEF speaker: Society 'should want' mind-reading devices
American Thinker ^ | 23 Jan, 2023 | Eric Utter
https://www.americanthinker.com/blog/2023/01/wef_speaker_society_should_want_mindreading_devices.html

Nita Farahany, recently speaking at the World Economic Forum‚Äôs (WEF) annual meeting in Davos, Switzerland, touted the ‚Äúextraordinary promise‚Äù of the use of mind-reading devices in the workplace and elsewhere. Farahany noted that the devices, in some forms, are already here. The legal ethicist and author of The Battle for Your Brain gave a talk titled ‚ÄúReady for Brain Transparency?‚Äù She cited existing consumer-wearable devices such as ‚Äúheadbands, hats that have sensors that can pick up your brain wave activity, earbuds, headphones, tiny tattoos that you can wear behind your ear -- we can pick up emotional states.‚Äù Kinda creepy if you ask me.

During a WEF ‚ÄúTransforming Medicine, Redefining Life‚Äù panel discussion, Farahany said that this technology will soon be integrated into ‚Äúmulti-functional devices,‚Äù so that -- for example -- the same earbuds used to take conference calls and listen to music would be laced with EEG sensors to pick up brain waves. The ‚Äúlegal ethicist‚Äù stated that it would then be possible to ‚Äúpick up and decode faces that you‚Äôre seeing in your mind, simple shapes, numbers, your pin number.‚Äù What could go wrong?

Farahany predicted that in the ‚Äúnear-term future,‚Äù such devices will become ‚Äúthe primary way with which we interact with all of the rest of our technology,‚Äù and pointed out that major tech companies like Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs Meta are already ‚Äúinvestigating ways to make these devices universally applicable.‚Äù She claimed this would allow a person to, for example, ‚Äúsimply swipe with your mind‚Äù instead of with a mouse or keyboard.

group.description: Oligarchy is a term for a government in which power is held by a select few individuals or a small class of powerful people. This can mean that these few people are the actual leaders, or that they influence or control the decisions that the leaders make (that they're the ones "pulling the strings " behind the scenes).
group.title: Global Oligarchy

card.description: The antidote to the liberal news media. Get a balanced view of what is happening around you. Not just the politically correct, liberal slant fed to you by the TV, newspapers and magazines.
card.title: ConservativeTruth.org - The Antidote to the Liberal News Media

_source.content: http://www.ConservativeTruth.orgGOP Rebels Deserve Credit for First Week SuccessBy Jeff Crouerehttp://www.Crouere.net"...Thankfully, the rebels stood firm through all the ballots. They realized this is not a time for business as usual in Congress. By forcing concessions from McCarthy, the Freedom Caucus members achieved some significant victories.According to Congressman Gaetz, ‚Äúthe American people have won‚Äù due to these concessions. He also believes that the House of Representatives will become a ‚Äúhealthier institution‚Äù due to these changes.In the view of Congressman Dan Bishop (R-NC), one of the concessions, the new investigative committee, modeled after the work done by the late Idaho Senator Frank Church in the 1970s, ‚Äúis a victory for the Constitutional rights of all Americans.‚Äù Bishop believes the new committee will be ‚Äúpowerful‚Äù and will address the ‚Äúweaponization of the federal government.‚ÄùAfter pledging to enact these reforms, Speaker McCarthy made several incredibly positive moves during his first week in the new position. He reiterated his pledge to remove U.S. Representatives Eric Swalwell (D-CA), Ilhan Omar (D-MN), and Adam Schiff (D-CA) from their respective House committees. This move is in response to Democrats removing Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Congressman Paul Gosar (R-AZ) from their committee assignments last year.This type of political payback is important. For too long, if Democrats controlled Congress, they treated Republicans horrendously and expected the GOP to never reciprocate when they took power. In the past, Republicans always wanted to be seen as nicer and less spiteful toward their Democratic colleagues. Fortunately, thanks to McCarthy, it seems those days are over.The first major Republican victory this week was the passage of a bill to strip more than $70 billion for the Internal Revenue Service (IRS). These funds were included in the laughably named ‚ÄúInflation Reduction Act‚Äù of 2022 which enabled the IRS to hire more than 87,000 new agents...."
_source.contentraw:
http://www.ConservativeTruth.org
GOP Rebels Deserve Credit for First Week Success
By Jeff Crouere
http://www.Crouere.net

"...Thankfully, the rebels stood firm through all the ballots. They realized this is not a time for business as usual in Congress. By forcing concessions from McCarthy, the Freedom Caucus members achieved some significant victories.
According to Congressman Gaetz, ‚Äúthe American people have won‚Äù due to these concessions. He also believes that the House of Representatives will become a ‚Äúhealthier institution‚Äù due to these changes.
In the view of Congressman Dan Bishop (R-NC), one of the concessions, the new investigative committee, modeled after the work done by the late Idaho Senator Frank Church in the 1970s, ‚Äúis a victory for the Constitutional rights of all Americans.‚Äù Bishop believes the new committee will be ‚Äúpowerful‚Äù and will address the ‚Äúweaponization of the federal government.‚Äù

After pledging to enact these reforms, Speaker McCarthy made several incredibly positive moves during his first week in the new position. He reiterated his pledge to remove U.S. Representatives Eric Swalwell (D-CA), Ilhan Omar (D-MN), and Adam Schiff (D-CA) from their respective House committees. This move is in response to Democrats removing Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Congressman Paul Gosar (R-AZ) from their committee assignments last year.

This type of political payback is important. For too long, if Democrats controlled Congress, they treated Republicans horrendously and expected the GOP to never reciprocate when they took power. In the past, Republicans always wanted to be seen as nicer and less spiteful toward their Democratic colleagues. Fortunately, thanks to McCarthy, it seems those days are over.

The first major Republican victory this week was the passage of a bill to strip more than $70 billion for the Internal Revenue Service (IRS). These funds were included in the laughably named ‚ÄúInflation Reduction Act‚Äù of 2022 which enabled the IRS to hire more than 87,000 new agents...."

_source.content: Well how about this ‚ÄúBullSchiff ‚Äú Request.House Democrat Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-NY) formally asked Speaker Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) this weekend to seat Reps. Adam Schiff (D-CA) and Eric Swalwell (D-CA) on the House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence.Jeffries requested in a letter shared by Punchbowl News that McCarthy ‚Äúhonor past practice‚Äù and accept Jeffries‚Äô recommendations of Schiff and Swalwell to the committee.Jeffries‚Äô letter comes after McCarthy indicated to reporters at a press conference on January 12 that he intended to follow through on a plan he first revealed in an interview with Breitbart News more than a year ago that he would strip Schiff and Swalwell of their seats on the Intel Committee, as well as Rep. Ilhan Omar (D-MN) of her seat on the Foreign Affairs Committee.McCarthy‚Äôs revelation came after Schiff, while serving as chair of the Intel Committee, perpetuated the Trump-Russia collusion theory, which the Justice Department later shut down as false. Schiff once said he had ‚Äúmore than circumstantial evidence‚Äù of collusion, ultimately leading all GOP members of the committee to call for his resignation as chairman.If you got the briefing I got from the FBI, you wouldn‚Äôt have Swalwell on any committee,‚Äù McCarthy said at the press conference. ‚ÄúHe cannot get a security clearance in the private sector.‚Äù Swalwell was having an affair with a Chinese Spy named Fang Fang. It was Gang Bang on da Fang Fang.In 2021, the House voted to remove Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) from their committees following inflammatory rhetoric and social media posts from Greene and Gosar targeting Democrats.McCarthy told Breitbart News last year he would use their removal as precedent for his forthcoming actions with Schiff and Swalwell, but Jeffries countered that Greene and Gosar were removed by a bipartisan House vote whereas the speaker, in consultation with the minority leader, appoints ‚Äî or in this case, rejects ‚Äî members to select committees.I would Immediately kick this Slimy F##ktard in da Nadlers and Slap da Livin Schiff out of him.F##k You and the Lying Dog Faced Pony you rode in on.
_source.contentraw:
Well how about this ‚ÄúBullSchiff ‚Äú Request.

House Democrat Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-NY) formally asked Speaker Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) this weekend to seat Reps. Adam Schiff (D-CA) and Eric Swalwell (D-CA) on the House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence.

Jeffries requested in a letter shared by Punchbowl News that McCarthy ‚Äúhonor past practice‚Äù and accept Jeffries‚Äô recommendations of Schiff and Swalwell to the committee.

Jeffries‚Äô letter comes after McCarthy indicated to reporters at a press conference on January 12 that he intended to follow through on a plan he first revealed in an interview with Breitbart News more than a year ago that he would strip Schiff and Swalwell of their seats on the Intel Committee, as well as Rep. Ilhan Omar (D-MN) of her seat on the Foreign Affairs Committee.

McCarthy‚Äôs revelation came after Schiff, while serving as chair of the Intel Committee, perpetuated the Trump-Russia collusion theory, which the Justice Department later shut down as false. Schiff once said he had ‚Äúmore than circumstantial evidence‚Äù of collusion, ultimately leading all GOP members of the committee to call for his resignation as chairman.

If you got the briefing I got from the FBI, you wouldn‚Äôt have Swalwell on any committee,‚Äù McCarthy said at the press conference. ‚ÄúHe cannot get a security clearance in the private sector.‚Äù Swalwell was having an affair with a Chinese Spy named Fang Fang. It was Gang Bang on da Fang Fang.

In 2021, the House voted to remove Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) from their committees following inflammatory rhetoric and social media posts from Greene and Gosar targeting Democrats.

McCarthy told Breitbart News last year he would use their removal as precedent for his forthcoming actions with Schiff and Swalwell, but Jeffries countered that Greene and Gosar were removed by a bipartisan House vote whereas the speaker, in consultation with the minority leader, appoints ‚Äî or in this case, rejects ‚Äî members to select committees.



I would Immediately kick this Slimy F##ktard in da Nadlers and Slap da Livin Schiff out of him.

F##k You and the Lying Dog Faced Pony you rode in on.

group.title: Libertarians of Gab

_source.content: Eric Dubay, his book, 200 Proofs the Earth is not a Spinning Ball, page 18‚ÄúNASA and modern astronomy say the Earth is a giant ball tilted back, wobbling and spinning 1000 miles per hour around its central axis, traveling 67,000 miles per hour circles around the sun, spiraling  500,000 miles per hour around the Milky Way, while the entire galaxy rockets a ridiculous 670,000,000 miles per hour through the universe, with all of these motions originating from an alleged ‚ÄúBig Bang‚Äù cosmogenic explosion 14 billions years ago. That‚Äôs a grand total of 670,568,000 miles per hour in several different directions we‚Äôre all supposedly speeding along at simultaneously, yet no one has ever seen, fell, heard measured or proven a single one of these motions to exist whatsoever.‚ÄùThe website ‚ÄúLive Science‚Äù (Warped Physics: 10 Effects of Faster-Than-Light Travel | Live Science) professes the helio-centric model as our reality, and not God as our reality, says the following under a heading of Time Travel: ‚ÄúSpecial relativity states that nothing can go faster than the speed of light. If something were to exceed this limit, it would move backward in time, according to the theory.‚ÄùThe speed of light is 186,000 miles per hour. The sun in the Milky Way galaxy is in motion in the spiral arm moving 500,000 miles per hour and the galaxy itself is hurling 670,000,000 miles per hour through the universe. Has anyone become much younger since they were born? I don‚Äôt know about you but I‚Äôm in my 50‚Äôs and I‚Äôm getting older.The website ‚ÄúHow Stuff Works‚Äù (What If You Traveled Faster Than the Speed of Light? | HowStuffWorks) professes the helio-centric model as our reality, not God as our reality, says the following: ‚ÄúAs an object approaches the speed of light, its mass rises precipitously. If an object tries to travel 186,000 miles per second, its mass becomes infinite, and so does the energy required to move it. For this reason, no normal object can travel as fast or faster than the speed of light.‚ÄùHas earth‚Äôs mass become infinite? What energy is moving the earth? What energy is moving the sun? What energy is moving galaxy? Is the earth no normal object, then?The website ‚ÄúBig Think‚Äù (The real reason you can't go faster than light speed - Big Think) professes the helio-centric model as our reality, not God as our reality, and answers the following question: ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs real reason you can‚Äôt go faster than the speed of light?‚Äù The site gives the following quick answer: ‚ÄúThe answer commonly given to the question, "Why can't we travel faster than the speed of light?" involves the mass of objects becoming infinitely large. That answer is fine, but there's a better one. Space and time are unified into a single entity known as spacetime. And every object travels through spacetime at the speed of light. Even a stationary object is moving at the speed of light, but it is moving only through time and not space.‚ÄùRemember according to NASA we‚Äôre moving a combined speed of a total 670,568,000 miles per hour in several different directions, 3605 times faster than the speed of light. In Star Trek terms, this is faster than Warp Speed 9.9. If you watched the show back in day, you remembered Chief Engineer Scottie would get aggravated if Captain Kirk pushed the Enterprise passed warp 8.Notice the doublespeak, ‚ÄúSpace and time are unified into a single entity known as spacetime. And every object travels through spacetime at the speed of light. Even a stationary object is moving at the speed of light, but it is moving only through time and not space.‚Äù This written this way deliberately, to confuse you.Objects that don‚Äôt move also move, in time not space, yet objects that don‚Äôt move in a unified spacetime. That‚Äôs the art of doublespeak, deliberately euphemistic, ambiguous, or obscure language.God created earth. Here‚Äôs what God has to say about the earth. The earth is fixed and immovable: 1 Chronicles 16:30, Psalm 33:9, Psalm 93:1, Psalm 96:10, Psalm 104:5, Psalm 119:89-90, Isaiah 14:7, Isaiah 45:18, Zechariah 1:11, 2 Peter 3:5If you believe in God and Jesus Christ, why do you believe in idolatrous ideas that contradict God?If you believe that the earth is a wobbling spinning space ball, then articulate why the earth is a globe. I‚Äôll bet you will have a hard time doing so. You‚Äôll have a hard time articulating, because you were told to believe in something without any evidence.Research Flat Earth with Eric Dubay and/or John ThorCheck out their channels on YouTube.
_source.contentraw:
Eric Dubay, his book, 200 Proofs the Earth is not a Spinning Ball, page 18

‚ÄúNASA and modern astronomy say the Earth is a giant ball tilted back, wobbling and spinning 1000 miles per hour around its central axis, traveling 67,000 miles per hour circles around the sun, spiraling 500,000 miles per hour around the Milky Way, while the entire galaxy rockets a ridiculous 670,000,000 miles per hour through the universe, with all of these motions originating from an alleged ‚ÄúBig Bang‚Äù cosmogenic explosion 14 billions years ago. That‚Äôs a grand total of 670,568,000 miles per hour in several different directions we‚Äôre all supposedly speeding along at simultaneously, yet no one has ever seen, fell, heard measured or proven a single one of these motions to exist whatsoever.‚Äù

The website ‚ÄúLive Science‚Äù (Warped Physics: 10 Effects of Faster-Than-Light Travel | Live Science) professes the helio-centric model as our reality, and not God as our reality, says the following under a heading of Time Travel: ‚ÄúSpecial relativity states that nothing can go faster than the speed of light. If something were to exceed this limit, it would move backward in time, according to the theory.‚Äù

The speed of light is 186,000 miles per hour. The sun in the Milky Way galaxy is in motion in the spiral arm moving 500,000 miles per hour and the galaxy itself is hurling 670,000,000 miles per hour through the universe. Has anyone become much younger since they were born? I don‚Äôt know about you but I‚Äôm in my 50‚Äôs and I‚Äôm getting older.

The website ‚ÄúHow Stuff Works‚Äù (What If You Traveled Faster Than the Speed of Light? | HowStuffWorks) professes the helio-centric model as our reality, not God as our reality, says the following: ‚ÄúAs an object approaches the speed of light, its mass rises precipitously. If an object tries to travel 186,000 miles per second, its mass becomes infinite, and so does the energy required to move it. For this reason, no normal object can travel as fast or faster than the speed of light.‚Äù

Has earth‚Äôs mass become infinite? What energy is moving the earth? What energy is moving the sun? What energy is moving galaxy? Is the earth no normal object, then?

The website ‚ÄúBig Think‚Äù (The real reason you can't go faster than light speed - Big Think) professes the helio-centric model as our reality, not God as our reality, and answers the following question: ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs real reason you can‚Äôt go faster than the speed of light?‚Äù The site gives the following quick answer: ‚ÄúThe answer commonly given to the question, "Why can't we travel faster than the speed of light?" involves the mass of objects becoming infinitely large. That answer is fine, but there's a better one. Space and time are unified into a single entity known as spacetime. And every object travels through spacetime at the speed of light. Even a stationary object is moving at the speed of light, but it is moving only through time and not space.‚Äù

Remember according to NASA we‚Äôre moving a combined speed of a total 670,568,000 miles per hour in several different directions, 3605 times faster than the speed of light. In Star Trek terms, this is faster than Warp Speed 9.9. If you watched the show back in day, you remembered Chief Engineer Scottie would get aggravated if Captain Kirk pushed the Enterprise passed warp 8.

Notice the doublespeak, ‚ÄúSpace and time are unified into a single entity known as spacetime. And every object travels through spacetime at the speed of light. Even a stationary object is moving at the speed of light, but it is moving only through time and not space.‚Äù

This written this way deliberately, to confuse you.

Objects that don‚Äôt move also move, in time not space, yet objects that don‚Äôt move in a unified spacetime. That‚Äôs the art of doublespeak, deliberately euphemistic, ambiguous, or obscure language.

God created earth. Here‚Äôs what God has to say about the earth. The earth is fixed and immovable: 1 Chronicles 16:30, Psalm 33:9, Psalm 93:1, Psalm 96:10, Psalm 104:5, Psalm 119:89-90, Isaiah 14:7, Isaiah 45:18, Zechariah 1:11, 2 Peter 3:5

If you believe in God and Jesus Christ, why do you believe in idolatrous ideas that contradict God?

If you believe that the earth is a wobbling spinning space ball, then articulate why the earth is a globe. I‚Äôll bet you will have a hard time doing so. You‚Äôll have a hard time articulating, because you were told to believe in something without any evidence.

Research Flat Earth with Eric Dubay and/or John Thor
Check out their channels on YouTube.

card.description: Read, hear, and study Scripture at the world's most-visited Christian website. Grow your faith with devotionals, Bible reading plans, and mobile apps.
card.title: BibleGateway.com: A searchable online Bible in over 150 versions and 50 languages.

_source.content: 1 of 2 -MATTHEW 7:21-23 (NLT)‚ÄúNot everyone who calls out to me, ‚ÄòLord! Lord!‚Äô will enter the Kingdom of Heaven. Only those who actually do the will of my Father in heaven will enter. On judgment day many will say to me, ‚ÄòLord! Lord! We prophesied in your name and cast out demons in your name and performed many miracles in your name.‚Äô But I will reply, ‚ÄòI never knew you. Get away from me, you who break God‚Äôs laws.‚Äô‚Äù2 TIMOTHY 3:5 (NLT)They will act religious, but they will reject the power that could make them godly. Stay away from people like that!https://www.biblegateway.com/Biblical description of cults, right there.A ‚Äúcult‚Äù is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù, but that‚Äôs another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There‚Äôs ALWAYS someone else as a ‚Äúleader‚Äù. Examples: Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It‚Äôs cults which add to Calvary, not GOD THE FATHER.An incorrect version of ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù exists in ANY cult which includes those ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù people. It‚Äôs totally impossible to ‚Äúearn a gift‚Äù. No ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù in false religions. One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn‚Äôt teach anything like either ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù or ‚Äúreligion‚Äù (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with GOD THE FATHER).By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything‚Äù. (‚ÄúThe Gospel message ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword: ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We‚Äôre under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, GOD THE FATHER changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren‚Äôt robots. A person ultimately only affects him or herself and forever‚Äôs a long time. We‚Äôre under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law.Will cheerfully do what GOD THE FATHER says instead. Feel free to take matters up with The Author if there‚Äôs some ‚Äúproblem‚Äù with how He writes His Own Book. That 1-on-1 with GOD THE FATHER happens with 100% of everyone whether he or she ‚Äúbelieves that way or not‚Äù (see Hebrews 9:27-28). Confidence on the Day of Judgment is critical. Psalm 118:8 implies that it‚Äôs better to trust in GOD THE FATHER than it is to put confidence in man.(SIDE NOTE - The term ‚ÄúChrist‚Äù is a title, not a name. It means either ‚ÄúThe Anointed One‚Äù or ‚ÄúMessiah‚Äù.)Rather than ask, ‚ÄúWhat would Jesus do?‚Äù Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It‚Äôs more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).In Hebrews 10:14, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù means (may I have a drumroll, please) ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù. (That‚Äôs spiritually-speaking, or course. The rest of you? Welcome to being human.)(ANOTHER SIDE NOTE ‚Äì In some translations, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù is worded as ‚ÄúForever‚Äù, ‚ÄúTo the end‚Äù or ‚ÄúFor eternity‚Äù.)According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.
_source.contentraw:
1 of 2 -
MATTHEW 7:21-23 (NLT)
‚ÄúNot everyone who calls out to me, ‚ÄòLord! Lord!‚Äô will enter the Kingdom of Heaven. Only those who actually do the will of my Father in heaven will enter. On
judgment day many will say to me, ‚ÄòLord! Lord! We prophesied in your name and cast out demons in your name and performed many miracles in your name.‚Äô But I will
reply, ‚ÄòI never knew you. Get away from me, you who break God‚Äôs laws.‚Äô‚Äù
2 TIMOTHY 3:5 (NLT)
They will act religious, but they will reject the power that could make them godly. Stay away from people like that!
https://www.biblegateway.com/

Biblical description of cults, right there.

A ‚Äúcult‚Äù is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù, but that‚Äôs another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and
fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His
Resurrection. There‚Äôs ALWAYS someone else as a ‚Äúleader‚Äù. Examples: Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of
the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard
of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in
Scripture...EVER. It‚Äôs cults which add to Calvary, not GOD THE FATHER.

An incorrect version of ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù exists in ANY cult which includes those ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù people. It‚Äôs totally impossible to ‚Äúearn a gift‚Äù. No ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù in false
religions. One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn‚Äôt teach anything like either
‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù or ‚Äúreligion‚Äù (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body =
present with GOD THE FATHER).

By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything‚Äù. (‚ÄúThe Gospel message ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword: ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù).
Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4).
We‚Äôre under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, GOD THE FATHER changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10
and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren‚Äôt robots. A person ultimately only affects him or herself and forever‚Äôs a long time. We‚Äôre under grace. Jesus
fulfilled 100% of the law.

Will cheerfully do what GOD THE FATHER says instead. Feel free to take matters up with The Author if there‚Äôs some ‚Äúproblem‚Äù with how He writes His Own Book. That 1
-on-1 with GOD THE FATHER happens with 100% of everyone whether he or she ‚Äúbelieves that way or not‚Äù (see Hebrews 9:27-28). Confidence on the Day of Judgment is
critical. Psalm 118:8 implies that it‚Äôs better to trust in GOD THE FATHER than it is to put confidence in man.

(SIDE NOTE - The term ‚ÄúChrist‚Äù is a title, not a name. It means either ‚ÄúThe Anointed One‚Äù or ‚ÄúMessiah‚Äù.)

Rather than ask, ‚ÄúWhat would Jesus do?‚Äù Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It‚Äôs more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more
feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).

In Hebrews 10:14, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù means (may I have a drumroll, please) ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù. (That‚Äôs spiritually-speaking, or course. The rest of you? Welcome to being
human.)
(ANOTHER SIDE NOTE ‚Äì In some translations, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù is worded as ‚ÄúForever‚Äù, ‚ÄúTo the end‚Äù or ‚ÄúFor eternity‚Äù.)

According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are
to test the spirits.
